ygData.subject: Re: Woven Goods
ygData.msgSnippet: that s an extremely good price!!! I wouldn t sell a woven tunic for less than 15pp, personally....and the other pieces...5-10pp each. From:	Chip Paul
ygData.messageBody:
that's an extremely good price!!!

I wouldn't sell a woven tunic for less than 15pp, personally....and
the other pieces...5-10pp each.




From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...> on 05/20/99 08:53 AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Woven Goods

From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>

> Jim Forsythe wrote:
>
> Does anybody know where I can find Woven Armour?
>
> Can these Items only be obtained by looting or is there a Merchant
> that sells them?
>
> I can't seem to find them anywhere on Faydwer.
>
> Thanks in Advance
>
> Zahlhedren
> Karana
>

They are carried by Froglocks in Guk. I purchased mine in Innothule
by standing at the zone entrance and auctioning. If you are a good
race, Innothule is still fairly safe - there are no guards between
the
zone and Guk. I bought a tunic and 3 smaller pieces for 10pp.
Don't
know if that is a good price or not, but that's what it was going
for
when I went.

Kaela
Tunare
